info.name: Materialized Google Search With Search Tools
info.description:
• Combining Athari's Google search tools and SHUST's google modern & clean design with my slight modification.
  • This style is for my personal use, thus I may just very occasionally update the script (including debug).

  • Please notice that this script may not perform well on the widescreen.

  • Future plan(s):

    • clean up the scripts
